DatabaseTable.name: 销售出库_sql_query
DatabaseTable.description: Created from SQL segment in file: sql_sap.sql (comment: 销售出库). Refer to query_template for details.
DatabaseTable.schema_ddl:
物料编号  -- 
已输入物料  -- 
销售订单项目短文本  -- 
实际交货数量(库存单位)  -- 
实际已交货量（按销售单位）  -- 
销售凭证  -- 
批次编号  -- 
交货单号  -- 
记录创建日期  -- 
计划货物移动日期  -- 
装载日期  -- 
运输计划日期  -- 
交货日期  -- 
拣配日期  -- 
公司间开票的客户编号  -- 
客户组  -- 
售达方(客户编码)  -- 
BPM合同编号  -- 
BPM订单号  -- 
项目名称  -- 
项目类型  -- 
合同金额  --
DatabaseTable.query_template:
SELECT 
    h.MATNR AS "物料编号",
    h.MATWA AS "已输入物料",
    h.ARKTX AS "销售订单项目短文本",
    h.LGMNG AS "实际交货数量(库存单位)",
    h.LFIMG AS "实际已交货量（按销售单位）",
    h.VGBEL AS "销售凭证",
    h.CHARG AS "批次编号",
    l.VBELN AS "交货单号",
    l.ERDAT AS "记录创建日期",
    l.WADAT  AS "计划货物移动日期",
    l.LDDAT AS "装载日期",
    l.TDDAT  AS "运输计划日期",
    l.LFDAT  AS "交货日期",
    l.KODAT AS "拣配日期",
    l.KUNIV AS "公司间开票的客户编号",
    l.KDGRP AS "客户组",
    v.KUNNR AS "售达方(客户编码)",
    v.ZCONTACT AS "BPM合同编号",
    v.ZVBELN AS "BPM订单号",
    v.ZXMMC AS "项目名称",
    v.ZXMLX AS "项目类型",
    v.ZHTJE AS "合同金额"
FROM LIPS h
LEFT JOIN LIKP l ON l.VBELN = h.VBELN 
LEFT JOIN VBAK v ON v.VBELN = h.VGBEL 
WHERE v.ZCONTACT IN ('SCJSD20231226-SCGLB01', 'SCJSD20240906-Q03', 'SCJSD20241114-K02')
ORDER BY h.VGBEL DESC;

DatabaseTable.name: 发货计划_sql_query
DatabaseTable.description: Created from SQL segment in file: sql_srm.sql (comment: 发货计划). Refer to query_template for details.
DatabaseTable.schema_ddl:
货物交接单编码  -- 
物料编码  -- 
物料名称  -- 
需求数量  -- 
缺料数量  -- 
可分配数量  -- 
已分配数量  -- 
需求日期  -- 
匹配状态  -- 
匹配状态描述  -- 
客户名称  -- 
客户地址  -- 
发货申请单号  -- 
合同号  -- 
项目名称  -- 
采购送货通知单  -- 
采购订单  -- 
订单数量  -- 
送货日期  -- 
送货物料号  -- 
送货物料名称  -- 
送货物料描述  -- 
送货物料品牌  -- 
需求日期  -- 
需求数量  -- 
确认日期  -- 
确认数量  -- 
通知单剩余可发货数量  -- 
收货地址  -- 
收货人  -- 
收货人电话  -- 
状态  -- 
状态描述  -- 
发送状态值  -- 
发送状态描述  -- 
物料组号  -- 
物料组名  --
DatabaseTable.query_template:
select
	plm.voucherNumber AS 货物交接单编码,
	plm.materialNumber AS 物料编码,
	plm.materialName AS 物料名称,
	plm.needQuantity AS 需求数量,
	plm.lackofMaterial AS 缺料数量,
	plm.distributableQuantity AS 可分配数量,
	plm.allocatedQuantity AS 已分配数量,
	plm.needDate AS 需求日期,
	plm.lackofMateriaStatus AS 匹配状态,
	CASE 
		WHEN plm.lackofMateriaStatus = '1' THEN '未匹配'
		WHEN plm.lackofMateriaStatus = '2' THEN '部分未匹配'
		WHEN plm.lackofMateriaStatus = '3' THEN '全匹配'
	END AS 匹配状态描述,
	plm.fbk4 AS 客户名称,
	plm.fbk7 AS 客户地址,
	plm.fbk10 AS 发货申请单号,
	plm.fbk49 AS 合同号,
	plm.fbk50 AS 项目名称,
	pdni.deliveryNoteNumber AS 采购送货通知单,
	pdni.orderNumber AS 采购订单,
	pdni.quantity AS 订单数量,
	pdni.deliveryDate AS 送货日期,
	pdni.materialNumber AS 送货物料号,
	pdni.materialName AS 送货物料名称,
	pdni.materialDesc AS 送货物料描述,
	pdni.materialBrand AS 送货物料品牌,
	pdni.needDate AS 需求日期,
	pdni.needQuantity AS 需求数量,
	pdni.confirmDate AS 确认日期,
	pdni.confirmQuantity AS 确认数量,
	pdni.remainQuantity AS 通知单剩余可发货数量,
	pdni.receivedAddress AS 收货地址,
	pdni.receivedUser AS 收货人,
	pdni.receivedPhone AS 收货人电话,
	pdni.itemStatus AS 状态,
	CASE
		WHEN pdni.itemStatus = '0' THEN '新建'
		WHEN pdni.itemStatus = '1' THEN '待回复'
		WHEN pdni.itemStatus = '2' THEN '待确认'
		WHEN pdni.itemStatus = '3' THEN '已确认'
		WHEN pdni.itemStatus = '4' THEN '重回'
		WHEN pdni.itemStatus = '5' THEN '拒绝'
	END AS 状态描述,
	pdni.sendStatus AS 发送状态值,
	CASE 
		WHEN pdni.sendStatus = '0' THEN '未发送'
		WHEN pdni.sendStatus = '1' THEN '已发送'
	END AS 发送状态描述,
	pdni.materialGroup AS 物料组号,
	pdni.materialGroupName AS 物料组名
from
	purchase_lackof_material plm
left join purchase_delivery_note_item pdni on
	pdni.fbk50 = plm.uuid
where
	plm.fbk49 in ('SCJSD20231226-SCGLB01', 'SCJSD20240906-Q03', 'SCJSD20241114-K02');

fields.名称: 通知单剩余可发货数量

DatabaseTable.name: 合同_sql_query
DatabaseTable.description: Created from SQL segment in file: sql_bpm.sql (comment: 合同). Refer to query_template for details.
DatabaseTable.schema_ddl:
合同主键ID  -- 
合同编号  -- 
客户ID  -- 
客户名称  -- 
项目类型描述分类  -- 
项目类型描述  -- 
最终客户ID  -- 
最终客户名称  -- 
销售合同分类  -- 
销售合同分类描述  -- 
变更后发货时间  -- 
收货单位ID  -- 
收货单位名称  -- 
收货人ID  -- 
收货人联系方式  -- 
收货地址  -- 
合同签订人ID  -- 
客户合同签订人ID  --
DatabaseTable.query_template:
SELECT
	cc.ID AS 合同主键ID,
	cc.CONTRACTNO AS 合同编号,
	cc.CUST_ID AS 客户ID,
	cus.NAME AS 客户名称,
	cc.CHARPARAMB3 AS 项目类型描述分类,
	CASE
		WHEN cc.CHARPARAMB3 = 'contract_isInland/1' THEN '国内项目'
		WHEN cc.CHARPARAMB3 = 'contract_isInland/2' THEN '出口直销'
		WHEN cc.CHARPARAMB3 = 'contract_isInland/3' THEN '出口直销无退税'
		WHEN cc.CHARPARAMB3 = 'contract_isInland/4' THEN '出口总包(国内)'
		WHEN cc.CHARPARAMB3 = 'contract_isInland/5' THEN '跨国业务'
		WHEN cc.CHARPARAMB3 = 'contract_isInland/6' THEN 'ODI(国内)'
		WHEN cc.CHARPARAMB3 = 'contract_isInland/7' THEN '出口总包(海外)'
		WHEN cc.CHARPARAMB3 = 'contract_isInland/8' THEN 'ODI(海外)'
		WHEN cc.CHARPARAMB3 = 'contract_isInland/9' THEN '海外本地业务'
	END AS 项目类型描述,
	cc.FINAL_CUST AS 最终客户ID,
	final_cus.NAME AS 最终客户名称,
	cc.MAIN_TYPE AS 销售合同分类,
	CASE
		WHEN cc.MAIN_TYPE = 'BasicInfo_dataType/001' THEN '工程型销售合同'
		WHEN cc.MAIN_TYPE = 'BasicInfo_dataType/002' THEN '产品型销售合同'
		WHEN cc.MAIN_TYPE = 'BasicInfo_dataType/003' THEN '产品型虚拟合同'
		WHEN cc.MAIN_TYPE = 'BasicInfo_dataType/004' THEN '仪表公司合同'
		WHEN cc.MAIN_TYPE = 'BasicInfo_dataType/005' THEN '委托代加工销售合同'
	END AS 销售合同分类描述,
	cc.SDELIVDATE AS 变更后发货时间,
	cc.SEC_CHARPARAMJ AS 收货单位ID,
	rec_cus.NAME AS 收货单位名称,
	cc.SEC_CHARPARAMK AS 收货人ID,
	cc.SEC_CHARPARAML AS 收货人联系方式,
	cc.SEC_CHARPARAMM AS 收货地址,
	cc.STAFFID AS 合同签订人ID,
	cc.SECBIGINTPARAME AS 客户合同签订人ID
FROM
	CONTRACT_COMMCONS cc
LEFT JOIN BASICDATA_CUSTOMERS cus ON
	cc.CUST_ID = cus.ID
LEFT JOIN BASICDATA_CUSTOMERS final_cus ON
	cc.FINAL_CUST = final_cus.ID
LEFT JOIN BASICDATA_CUSTOMERS rec_cus ON
	cc.SEC_CHARPARAMJ = rec_cus.ID
WHERE
	cc.CONTRACTNO in ('SCJSD20231226-SCGLB01','SCJSD20240906-Q03','SCJSD20241114-K02')
	AND cc.MAIN_TYPE = 'BasicInfo_dataType/002'; -- 产品型销售合同

DatabaseTable.name: 销售订单_sql_query
DatabaseTable.description: Created from SQL segment in file: sql_bpm.sql (comment: 销售订单). Refer to query_template for details.
DatabaseTable.schema_ddl:
订单主键ID  -- 
创建人ID  -- 
是否有效  -- 
有效性描述  -- 
公司ID  -- 
流程ID  --

状态描述  --

交货方式描述  --

客户ID  --

合同金额  -- 
合同ID  -- 
合同编号  -- 
是否更改计划发货日期  -- 
是否更改发货日期描述  -- 
表单ID  -- 
SAP订单号  -- 
SAP开票标识  -- 
开票状态描述  -- 
是否传入SAP  -- 
SAP同步状态描述  -- 
SAP采购申请号  -- 
数量  -- 
重要信息  -- 
SAP最晚实际交货日期  -- 
是否紧急项目  -- 
紧急项目描述  --
DatabaseTable.query_template:
SELECT 
    pso.ID AS 订单主键ID,
    pso.CREATE_STAFF_ID AS 创建人ID,
    pso.VALID AS 是否有效,
    CASE 
        WHEN pso.VALID = 1 THEN '有效'
        WHEN pso.VALID = 0 THEN '作废'
    END AS 有效性描述,
    pso.CID AS 公司ID,
    pso.DEPLOYMENT_ID AS 流程ID,
    pso.STATUS AS 订单状态,
    CASE 
        WHEN pso.STATUS = 99 THEN '生效'
        WHEN pso.STATUS = 88 THEN '流程中'
        WHEN pso.STATUS = 0 THEN '作废'
    END AS 状态描述,
    pso.EFFECT_TIME AS 生效时间,
    pso.EFFECT_STAFF_ID AS 生效人ID,
    pso.TABLE_NO AS 订单编号,
    pso.FETCHSTYLE AS 交货方式编码,
    CASE 
        WHEN FETCHSTYLE = 'BasicInfo_5801/1001' THEN '上门提货'
        WHEN FETCHSTYLE = 'BasicInfo_5801/1002' THEN '送货'
        WHEN FETCHSTYLE = 'BasicInfo_5801/1003' THEN '生效后立即发货'
    END AS 交货方式描述,
    pso.FETCHDATE AS 订单交货日期,
    pso.CUST_ID AS 客户ID,
    cus.NAME AS 客户名称,
    pso.CURRENT_SUM AS 合同金额,
    pso.CONTRACT AS 合同ID,
    cc.CONTRACTNO AS 合同编号,
    pso.CHANGE_DATE AS 是否更改计划发货日期,
    CASE 
        WHEN CHANGE_DATE = 'BasicInfo_isTrue/1' THEN '是'
        WHEN CHANGE_DATE = 'BasicInfo_isTrue/0' THEN '否'
        ELSE '未知'
    END AS 是否更改发货日期描述,
    pso.TABLE_INFO_ID AS 表单ID,
    pso.SAP_NO AS SAP订单号,
    pso.SAPKPBS AS SAP开票标识,
    CASE 
        WHEN SAPKPBS = 'projOrder_sapkpbs/A' THEN '未开票'
        WHEN SAPKPBS = 'projOrder_sapkpbs/B' THEN '部分开票'
        WHEN SAPKPBS = 'projOrder_sapkpbs/C' THEN '完全开票'
        ELSE '未知状态'
    END AS 开票状态描述,
    pso.ISSYNCSAP AS 是否传入SAP,
    CASE 
        WHEN pso.ISSYNCSAP = 1 THEN '已传入'
        WHEN pso.ISSYNCSAP = 0 THEN '未传入'
        ELSE '未知'
    END AS SAP同步状态描述,
    pso.SAP_PR AS SAP采购申请号,
    pso.QUANTITY AS 数量,
    pso.ZYXX AS 重要信息,
    pso.LATEST_DATE AS SAP最晚实际交货日期,
    pso.IS_EMERGENCY AS 是否紧急项目,
    CASE 
        WHEN pso.IS_EMERGENCY = 1 THEN '紧急'
        WHEN pso.IS_EMERGENCY = 0 THEN '不紧急'
    END AS 紧急项目描述
FROM PROJORDER_SALE_ORDERS pso
LEFT JOIN BASICDATA_CUSTOMERS cus ON pso.CUST_ID = cus.ID
LEFT JOIN CONTRACT_COMMCONS cc ON pso.CONTRACT = cc.ID
WHERE pso.CONTRACT in (51952719418373, 128694894060421, 163995654764741);

fields.名称: 是否更改计划发货日期
是否更改发货日期描述

        WHEN popg.CHARPARMJ = '1' THEN '是'
        WHEN popg.CHARPARMJ = '0' THEN '否'
    END AS 选型条件描述,
    popg.PRODUCT_ROW AS SAP订单物品行号,
    popg.FULL_CODE AS 物料全编码,

签收单要求  -- 
是否通知采购到货  --
DatabaseTable.query_template:
SELECT 
    pdh.ID AS 发货单主键ID,
    pdh.CREATE_STAFF_ID AS 创建人ID,
    pdh.VALID AS 是否有效,
    CASE 
        WHEN pdh.VALID = 1 THEN '有效'
        WHEN pdh.VALID = 0 THEN '作废'
        ELSE '未知'
    END AS 有效性描述,
    pdh.DEPLOYMENT_ID AS 流程ID,
    pdh.STATUS AS 状态,
    CASE 
        WHEN pdh.STATUS = 99 THEN '生效'
        WHEN pdh.STATUS = 88 THEN '流程中'
        WHEN pdh.STATUS = 0 THEN '作废'
    END AS 状态描述,
    pdh.EFFECT_TIME AS 生效时间,
    pdh.EFFECT_STAFF_ID AS 生效操作人ID,
    pdh.TABLE_NO AS 发货申请单编号,
    pdh.URGENT_DEL AS 紧急发货要求,
    CASE 
        WHEN pdh.URGENT_DEL = 'BasicInfo_urgentDel/0' THEN '顺丰'
        WHEN pdh.URGENT_DEL = 'BasicInfo_urgentDel/1' THEN '专车'
        WHEN pdh.URGENT_DEL = 'BasicInfo_urgentDel/2' THEN '插单'
    END AS 紧急发货要求描述,
    pdh.TOTAL_SM_PRICE AS 本次发货物资总金额,
    pdh.TOTAL_RATE AS 本次发货物资金额比例,
    pdh.TOTAL_AGING AS 历史欠款账龄合计,
    pdh.SUPP_AMOUNT AS 补充合同金额,
    pdh.STOCK_RESON AS 备货原因,
    pdh.SHOULD_SUM AS 发货前应到款,
    CASE 
    		WHEN pdh.SHIP_TYPE = 'BasicInfo_shipType/1' THEN '汽运'
    		WHEN pdh.SHIP_TYPE = 'BasicInfo_shipType/2' THEN '快递'
    		WHEN pdh.SHIP_TYPE = 'BasicInfo_shipType/3' THEN '用户自提'
    		WHEN pdh.SHIP_TYPE = 'BasicInfo_shipType/4' THEN '带至科技园'
    		WHEN pdh.SHIP_TYPE = 'BasicInfo_shipType/5' THEN '供应商直发'
    		WHEN pdh.SHIP_TYPE = 'BasicInfo_shipType/6' THEN '冲抵借条'
    		WHEN pdh.SHIP_TYPE = 'BasicInfo_shipType/7' THEN '冲抵现场红字退库'
    		WHEN pdh.SHIP_TYPE = 'BasicInfo_shipType/9' THEN '销售或工程等员工自提'
    		WHEN pdh.SHIP_TYPE = 'BasicInfo_shipType/10' THEN '客户集装箱提货（海外专用）'
    		WHEN pdh.SHIP_TYPE = 'BasicInfo_shipType/11' THEN '集装箱提货（海外专用）'
    		WHEN pdh.SHIP_TYPE = 'BasicInfo_shipType/12' THEN '国际快递（海外专用）'
    		WHEN pdh.SHIP_TYPE = 'BasicInfo_shipType/14' THEN '远程授权'
    END AS 出厂运输方式,
    pdh.SALE_LIST_NO AS 销售退库清单编号,
    pdh.REQ_DATE AS 要求发货日期,
    pdh.REMARK AS 备注,
    pdh.ISCHANGE_ADDR AS 是否需要更改收货地址,
    CASE 
        WHEN pdh.ISCHANGE_ADDR = 1 THEN '是'
        WHEN pdh.ISCHANGE_ADDR = 0 THEN '否'
    END AS 更改收货地址描述,
    CASE
    		WHEN pdh.IS_WAI_XIE = 'BasicInfo_isTrue/1' THEN '是'
    		WHEN pdh.IS_WAI_XIE = 'BasicInfo_isTrue/0' THEN '否'
    END AS 是否需要生成外协厂送货单,
    CASE 
    		WHEN pdh.IS_SUPPLIER_STRAIGHT = '1' THEN '是'
    		WHEN pdh.IS_SUPPLIER_STRAIGHT = '0' THEN '否'
    END AS 是否供应商直发,
    pdh.IS_NEGATIVE AS 红蓝字,
    CASE
	    WHEN pdh.IS_NEGATIVE = 'salemanage_invoiceType/001' THEN '蓝字'
        WHEN pdh.IS_NEGATIVE = 'salemanage_invoiceType/002' THEN '红字'
        WHEN pdh.IS_NEGATIVE = 'salemanage_invoiceType/003' THEN '超级录入'
        WHEN pdh.IS_NEGATIVE = 'salemanage_invoiceType/004' THEN '海外蓝票'
        WHEN pdh.IS_NEGATIVE = 'salemanage_invoiceType/005' THEN '通用开票'
    END AS 红蓝字描述,
    pdh.IF_STOCK AS 是否备货,
    CASE 
        WHEN pdh.IF_STOCK = 1 THEN '是'
        WHEN pdh.IF_STOCK = 0 THEN '否'
    END AS 备货状态描述,
    pdh.DATEPARAMD AS 要求到货日期,
    pdh.CONTRACT AS 合同ID,
    cc.CONTRACTNO AS 合同编号,
    pdh.CONTR_SUM AS 合同总金额,
    pdh.COMMIT_DES AS 本次承诺情况,
    pdh.CHANGE_REASON AS 更改原因,
    pdh.CHANGE_PHONE AS 更改后收货人联系方式,
    pdh.TABLE_INFO_ID AS 表单ID,
    pdh.CHANGE_LINK_PERSON AS 更改后收货人,
    pdh.CHANGE_CUST AS 更改后收货单位,
    pdh.CHANGE_ADDR_OBJ AS 更改后收货地址,
    pdh.PLAN_DEL_DATE AS 项目计划发货日期,
    CASE 
	    	WHEN pdh.SHIP_CLA_SYS = 'BasicInfo_shipCla/1' THEN '产品型发货'
	    	WHEN pdh.SHIP_CLA_SYS = 'BasicInfo_shipCla/2' THEN '项目型发货'
    END AS 发货分类,
    CASE 
    		WHEN pdh.PROJ_SCALE = 'BasicInfo_projectScale/001' THEN '小项目'
    		WHEN pdh.PROJ_SCALE = 'BasicInfo_projectScale/002' THEN '中项目'
    		WHEN pdh.PROJ_SCALE = 'BasicInfo_projectScale/003' THEN '大小项目'
    		WHEN pdh.PROJ_SCALE = 'BasicInfo_projectScale/004' THEN '其他项目'
    END AS 项目规模,
    pdh.SHIP_PROCESS_FLAG AS 发货流程分类,
    CASE 
        WHEN pdh.SHIP_PROCESS_FLAG = '0' THEN '产品型发货流程'
        WHEN pdh.SHIP_PROCESS_FLAG = '1' THEN '项目型发货流程'
    END AS 发货流程分类描述,
    CASE 
    		WHEN pdh.RECEIPT_MARK = 'basicData_receiptMark/0' THEN '无'
    		WHEN pdh.RECEIPT_MARK = 'basicData_receiptMark/1' THEN '客户模板签收单（必须上传附件）' 
    END AS 签收单要求,
    CASE
    		WHEN pdh.IS_PRODUCT_ARR = '0' THEN '否'
    		WHEN pdh.IS_PRODUCT_ARR = '1' THEN '是'
    END AS 是否通知采购到货
FROM PROJORDER_DELIVERY_HEADS pdh
LEFT JOIN CONTRACT_COMMCONS cc ON pdh.CONTRACT = cc.ID
WHERE pdh.CONTRACT in (51952719418373, 128694894060421, 163995654764741);

SELECT

    pdb.DELIVERY_HEAD AS 发货申请单头ID,

    pdh.TABLE_NO AS 发货单编号,
    pdb.CREATE_TIME AS 创建时间,
    pdb.CREATE_STAFF_ID AS 创建人ID,
    pdb.VALID AS 是否有效,
    CASE

    pdb.TABLE_INFO_ID AS 单据信息ID,

    pdb.BOM_CODE AS BOM编码,

    pdb.SM_PRICE AS 结算价,
    pdb.IS_SET AS 是否齐套,
    CASE 
        WHEN pdb.IS_SET = '1' THEN '是'
        WHEN pdb.IS_SET = '0' THEN '否'
    END AS 齐套状态描述,
    pdb.SEND_DATE AS 销售要求发货日期,
    pdb.IS_SEND AS 是否供应商直发,
    CASE 
        WHEN pdb.IS_SEND = 1 THEN '是'
        WHEN pdb.IS_SEND = 0 THEN '否'
    END AS 供应商直发描述,
    pdb.IS_PARK_PROD AS 是否园区物资,
    CASE 
        WHEN pdb.IS_PARK_PROD = 1 THEN '是'
        WHEN pdb.IS_PARK_PROD = 0 THEN '否'
    END AS 园区物资描述,
    pdb.VENDOR AS 供应商ID,
    bv.NAME AS 供应商名称,
    pdb.SALE_ORDER AS 销售订单ID,
    pso.TABLE_NO AS 销售订单编号,
    pdb.PROD_CG AS 物品采购属性,
    pdb.ISDZPROD AS 是否定制物品,
    CASE 
        WHEN pdb.ISDZPROD = '1' THEN '是'
        WHEN pdb.ISDZPROD = '0' THEN '否'
    END AS 定制物品描述,
    pdb.SAP_NO AS SAP订单唯一行号,
    pdb.SAP_ORDER_NO AS SAP订单号,
    pdb.WBS_CODE AS WBS号,
    pdb.BPM_SALE_PART_GATHER AS BPM订单汇总ID,

FROM PROJORDER_DELIVERY_BODIES pdb
LEFT JOIN PROJORDER_DELIVERY_HEADS pdh ON pdb.DELIVERY_HEAD = pdh.ID
LEFT JOIN BASICDATA_PRODUCTS bp ON pdb.PRODUCT = bp.ID
LEFT JOIN BASICDATA_VENDORS bv ON pdb.VENDOR = bv.ID
LEFT JOIN PROJORDER_SALE_ORDERS pso ON pdb.SALE_ORDER = pso.ID
WHERE pdh.CONTRACT IN (51952719418373, 128694894060421, 163995654764741);

DatabaseTable.query_template:
SELECT 
    pgd.ID AS 货物交接单主键ID,
    pgd.VERSION AS 版本号,
    pgd.CREATE_TIME AS 创建时间,
    pgd.CREATE_STAFF_ID AS 创建人ID,
    pgd.VALID AS 是否有效,
    CASE 
        WHEN pgd.VALID = 1 THEN '有效'
        WHEN pgd.VALID = 0 THEN '无效'
    END AS 有效性描述,
    pgd.DEPLOYMENT_ID AS 流程ID,
    pgd.STATUS AS 状态,
    CASE 
        WHEN pgd.STATUS = 99 THEN '生效'
        WHEN pgd.STATUS = 88 THEN '流程中'
        WHEN pgd.STATUS = 0 THEN '作废'
    END AS 状态描述,
    pgd.EFFECT_TIME AS 生效时间,
    pgd.EFFECT_STAFF_ID AS 生效操作人ID,
    pgd.TABLE_NO AS 货物交接单号,
    pgd.URGENT_DEL AS 紧急发货要求,
    CASE 
        WHEN pgd.URGENT_DEL = 'BasicInfo_urgentDel/0' THEN '顺丰'
        WHEN pgd.URGENT_DEL = 'BasicInfo_urgentDel/1' THEN '专车'
        WHEN pgd.URGENT_DEL = 'BasicInfo_urgentDel/2' THEN '插单'
    END AS 紧急发货要求描述,
    pgd.TRANS_TEL AS 货运公司联系方式,
    pgd.TRANS_FEE AS 运输费,
    pgd.TRANS_COM AS 货运公司,
    pgd.TRACK_NUM AS 运单号,
    pgd.TOTAL_NUM AS 预估总箱数,
    pgd.TOTAL_FEE AS 运费合计,
    CASE 
    		WHEN pgd.SUP_ASSUMER = 'projOrder_supAssumer/001' THEN '销售'
    		WHEN pgd.SUP_ASSUMER = 'projOrder_supAssumer/002' THEN '工程'
    		WHEN pgd.SUP_ASSUMER = 'projOrder_supAssumer/003' THEN '采购'
    		WHEN pgd.SUP_ASSUMER = 'projOrder_supAssumer/004' THEN '制造'
    		WHEN pgd.SUP_ASSUMER = 'projOrder_supAssumer/005' THEN '供应链'
    		WHEN pgd.SUP_ASSUMER = 'projOrder_supAssumer/006' THEN '未定'
    END AS 中控内部承担方, 
    pgd.SPEFRI_REQ AS 特殊货运要求,
    pgd.SPECAR_REQ AS 特殊装车要求,
    pgd.SHIP_LINKER AS 收货人ID,
    pgd.SHIP_CUST AS 收货单位ID,
    pgd.SHIP_ADDR AS 收货地址,
    CASE 
    		WHEN pgd.SEND_TYPE = 'projOrder_sendType/001' THEN '汽运'
    		WHEN pgd.SEND_TYPE = 'projOrder_sendType/002' THEN '国内快递'
    		WHEN pgd.SEND_TYPE = 'projOrder_sendType/003' THEN '用户自提'
    		WHEN pgd.SEND_TYPE = 'projOrder_sendType/004' THEN '带至科技园'
    		WHEN pgd.SEND_TYPE = 'projOrder_sendType/005' THEN '供应商直发'
    		WHEN pgd.SEND_TYPE = 'projOrder_sendType/006' THEN '冲抵借条'
    		WHEN pgd.SEND_TYPE = 'projOrder_sendType/007' THEN '冲抵现场红字退库'
    		WHEN pgd.SEND_TYPE = 'projOrder_sendType/008' THEN '销售或工程等员工自提'
    		WHEN pgd.SEND_TYPE = 'projOrder_sendType/010' THEN '汽运调拨'
    		WHEN pgd.SEND_TYPE = 'projOrder_sendType/011' THEN '快递调拨'
    		WHEN pgd.SEND_TYPE = 'projOrder_sendType/012' THEN '客户现场拉回'
    		WHEN pgd.SEND_TYPE = 'projOrder_sendType/013' THEN '客户集装箱提货'
    		WHEN pgd.SEND_TYPE = 'projOrder_sendType/014' THEN '集装箱提货'
    		WHEN pgd.SEND_TYPE = 'projOrder_sendType/015' THEN '国际快递'
    END AS 发货方式,
    pgd.SEND_DATE AS 要求发货日期,
    pgd.LOG_COM AS 物流公司,
    CASE 
    		WHEN pgd.EXPRESS_COM = 'projOrder_expressCom/001' THEN '邮政EMS'
    		WHEN pgd.EXPRESS_COM = 'projOrder_expressCom/002' THEN '顺丰快递'
    		WHEN pgd.EXPRESS_COM = 'projOrder_expressCom/003' THEN '航空快件'
    		WHEN pgd.EXPRESS_COM = 'projOrder_expressCom/004' THEN '联邦快递'
    		WHEN pgd.EXPRESS_COM = 'projOrder_expressCom/005' THEN '京东快递'
    		WHEN pgd.EXPRESS_COM = 'projOrder_expressCom/006' THEN '临时供方'
    		WHEN pgd.EXPRESS_COM = 'projOrder_expressCom/007' THEN '跨越速运'
    END AS 快递公司,
    CASE 
    		WHEN pgd.DELIVERY_TYPE = 'projOrder_deliveryType/001' THEN '直发'
    		WHEN pgd.DELIVERY_TYPE = 'projOrder_deliveryType/002' THEN '非直发'
    		WHEN pgd.DELIVERY_TYPE = 'projOrder_deliveryType/003' THEN '北方基地'
    END AS 货物交接单类型,
    pgd.ARRIVAL_DATE AS 要求到货日期,
    pgd.REALTOTAL_NUM AS 实际总箱数,
    pgd.ISABNORNAL AS 是否异常发货,
    CASE 
        WHEN pgd.ISABNORNAL = 1 THEN '是'
        WHEN pgd.ISABNORNAL = 0 THEN '否'
    END AS 异常发货描述,
    CASE 
    		WHEN pgd.FULL_STATUS = 'projOrder_fullStatus/001' THEN '未发货'
    		WHEN pgd.FULL_STATUS = 'projOrder_fullStatus/002' THEN '部分完成'
    		WHEN pgd.FULL_STATUS = 'projOrder_fullStatus/003' THEN '全部完成'
    END AS 发货完成状态, -- projOrder_fullStatus/
    pgd.ABNORNALEX AS 异常说明,
    CASE 
    		WHEN pgd.STATE = 'projOrder_state/0' THEN '未签收'
    		WHEN pgd.STATE = 'projOrder_state/1' THEN '已签收'
    		WHEN pgd.STATE = 'projOrder_state/2' THEN '运单号错误'
    END AS 物流状态, 
    pgd.ISNOTI AS 是否通知调度,
    CASE 
        WHEN pgd.ISNOTI = 1 THEN '是'
        WHEN pgd.ISNOTI = 0 THEN '否'
    END AS 通知调度描述,
    pgd.CONTRACT AS 合同ID,
    cc.CONTRACTNO AS 合同编号,
    pgd.TABLE_INFO_ID AS 单据信息ID,
    pgd.ISUPLOAD AS 报关清关资料是否上传,
    CASE 
        WHEN pgd.ISUPLOAD = 1 THEN '已上传'
        WHEN pgd.ISUPLOAD = 0 THEN '未上传'
    END AS 资料上传状态,
    pgd.ISRETURNPACK AS 装箱是否返回,
    CASE 
        WHEN pgd.ISRETURNPACK = 1 THEN '已返回'
        WHEN pgd.ISRETURNPACK = 0 THEN '未返回'
    END AS 装箱返回状态,
    pgd.GOODS_HEAD AS 国内货物交接单,
    pgd.ACCEPT_COMCODE AS 承运单位编码,
    pgd.ORDER_IDSF AS 顺丰订单ID,
    pgd.ORDER_IDJD AS 京东订单ID,
    pgd.DELIVERY_TABLE_NOS AS 发货申请单号,
    pgd.IS_SYNC_SAP_CGSQ AS 是否已生成采购申请,
    pgd.IS_TMS_TRIGGER AS 是否TMS触发配置,
    pgd.SHIP_LINKER_NEW AS 新收货人,
    pgd.SHIP_LINKER_MOBILE AS 收货联系人手机,
    pgd.SHIP_CUST_NEW AS 新收货单位,
    pgd.SHIP_ADDR_NEW AS 新收货地址,
    pgd.SHIPZKLINKER AS 中控收货人,
    pgd.SH_STAFF AS 确认收货待办人,
    pgd.EDIT_LAST_SUBMITER AS 最后编辑提交人ID,
    pgd.PO_APP_STAFF AS 采购订单匹配待办人,
    pgd.READY_TIME_NEW AS 新货好时间,
    pgd.DELIVERY_RATIO AS 本次发货比例
FROM PROJORDER_GOODSDELIVERIES pgd
LEFT JOIN CONTRACT_COMMCONS cc ON pgd.CONTRACT = cc.ID

DatabaseTable.schema_ddl:
接单明细主键ID  -- 
创建时间  -- 
创建人ID  -- 
是否有效  -- 
有效性描述  -- 
单据信息ID  -- 
货物交接单ID  -- 
货物交接单号  -- 
销售订单部件汇总ID  -- 
产品ID  -- 
产品名称  -- 
申请货运数量  -- 
发货申请单数量  -- 
本次已装箱数量  -- 
主单位ID  -- 
协商后发货日期  -- 
运单号  -- 
发货方  -- 
发货方描述  -- 
是否供应商直发  -- 
供应商直发描述  -- 
实际到货现场日期  -- 
实际发货日期  -- 
实际出库日期  -- 
发货申请单号  -- 
物品清点状态  -- 
清点状态描述  --

异常原因分析  --

供应商编码  --

特殊备注  --
DatabaseTable.query_template:
SELECT 
    ppi.ID AS 接单明细主键ID,
    ppi.CREATE_TIME AS 创建时间,
    ppi.CREATE_STAFF_ID AS 创建人ID,
    ppi.VALID AS 是否有效,
    CASE 
        WHEN ppi.VALID = 1 THEN '有效'
        WHEN ppi.VALID = 0 THEN '无效'
    END AS 有效性描述,
    ppi.TABLE_INFO_ID AS 单据信息ID,
    ppi.DELIVERY_HEAD AS 货物交接单ID,
    pgd.TABLE_NO AS 货物交接单号,
    ppi.ORDERPART_GATHER AS 销售订单部件汇总ID,
    ppi.PRODUCT AS 产品ID,
    bp.NAME AS 产品名称,
    ppi.APPLY_QUANTITY AS 申请货运数量,
    ppi.DEL_QUANTITY AS 发货申请单数量,
    ppi.BOXEDNUM AS 本次已装箱数量,
    ppi.MUNIT AS 主单位ID,
    ppi.XSHSEND_DATE AS 协商后发货日期,
    ppi.TRACK_NUMS AS 运单号,
    ppi.SHIPPER AS 发货方,
    CASE 
        WHEN ppi.SHIPPER = 'projOrder_shipper/001' THEN '中控'
        WHEN ppi.SHIPPER = 'projOrder_shipper/002' THEN '供应商'
        WHEN ppi.SHIPPER = 'projOrder_shipper/003' THEN '北方基地'
    END AS 发货方描述,
    ppi.IS_SEND AS 是否供应商直发,
    CASE 
        WHEN ppi.IS_SEND = 1 THEN '是'
        WHEN ppi.IS_SEND = 0 THEN '否'
    END AS 供应商直发描述,
    ppi.REAL_ARRDATE AS 实际到货现场日期,
    ppi.REAL_SENDDATE AS 实际发货日期,
    ppi.REAL_OUTBOUND_DATE AS 实际出库日期,
    ppi.DELIVERY_NO AS 发货申请单号,
    ppi.PROD_INVE_STATUS AS 物品清点状态,
    CASE 
        WHEN ppi.PROD_INVE_STATUS = 'projOrder_listStatus/1' THEN '未操作'
        WHEN ppi.PROD_INVE_STATUS = 'projOrder_listStatus/2' THEN '已操作'
    END AS 清点状态描述,
    ppi.DELIVERY_AFTER_DATE AS 发货单计划可交付日期,
    ppi.ABNORMAL_CAUSE_ANALYSIS AS 异常原因分析,
    ppi.VENDOR_NAME AS 供应商名称,
    ppi.VENDOR_CODE AS 供应商编码,
    ppi.PURCH_CONTR AS 采购合同,
    ppi.SPECIAL_REMARKS AS 特殊备注
FROM PROJORDER_PRODINFOS ppi
LEFT JOIN PROJORDER_GOODSDELIVERIES pgd ON ppi.DELIVERY_HEAD = pgd.ID
LEFT JOIN BASICDATA_PRODUCTS bp ON ppi.PRODUCT = bp.ID
WHERE pgd.CONTRACT IN (51952719418373, 128694894060421, 163995654764741);

DatabaseTable.query_template:
SELECT

    ppr.DEPLOYMENT_ID AS 流程ID,
    ppr.STATUS AS 状态,
    CASE 
        WHEN ppr.STATUS = 99 THEN '生效'
        WHEN ppr.STATUS = 88 THEN '流程中'
        WHEN ppr.STATUS = 0 THEN '作废'
    END AS 状态描述,
    ppr.EFFECT_TIME AS 生效时间,
    ppr.EFFECT_STAFF_ID AS 生效操作人ID,
    ppr.TABLE_NO AS 签收单号,

    ppr.RECEIVER AS 要求客户签收人,
    ppr.CONSIGNEE AS 收货人ID,
    ppr.FREIGHT_CONTACT AS 货运联系方式,
    ppr.DELIVERY_ADDRESS AS 供应商发货地址,
    ppr.DELIVERDATE AS 供应商发货时间,
    ppr.ARRIVAL_DATE AS 预计到货日期,
    ppr.COURIER_NUMBER AS 物流单编号,
    ppr.CONTRACT_NO AS 中控销售合同编号,
    ppr.CONTRACT AS 合同ID,
    cc.CONTRACTNO AS 合同编号,
    ppr.CONTR_TYPE AS 合同类型,
    CASE 
        WHEN ppr.CONTR_TYPE = 'BasicInfo_dataType/001' THEN '工程型销售合同'
        WHEN ppr.CONTR_TYPE = 'BasicInfo_dataType/002' THEN '产品型销售合同'
    END AS 合同类型描述,
    ppr.PROJ_ORDER_RECEIVE_STATUS AS 单据收货状态,
    CASE 
        WHEN ppr.PROJ_ORDER_RECEIVE_STATUS = 'projOrder_receiveStatus/01' THEN '未收货'
        WHEN ppr.PROJ_ORDER_RECEIVE_STATUS = 'projOrder_receiveStatus/02' THEN '部分收货'
        WHEN ppr.PROJ_ORDER_RECEIVE_STATUS = 'projOrder_receiveStatus/03' THEN '全部收货'
    END AS 收货状态描述,

    pgd.TABLE_NO AS 货物交接单号,

DatabaseTable.query_template:
SELECT 
    ppri.ID AS 签收单明细主键ID,
    ppri.CREATE_TIME AS 创建时间,
    ppri.CREATE_STAFF_ID AS 创建人ID,
    ppri.TABLE_INFO_ID AS 单据信息ID,
    ppri.MAIN_ID AS 直发现场签收单ID,
    ppr.TABLE_NO AS 签收单号,
    ppri.GOODS_DELIVERY AS 货物交接单ID,
    pgd.TABLE_NO AS 货物交接单号,
    ppri.PRODUCT AS 产品ID,
    bp.NAME AS 产品名称,
    ppri.MATERIAL_CODE AS 物料编码,
    ppri.MATERIAL_NAME AS 物料名称,
    ppri.BRAND AS 品牌,
    ppri.NUM AS 数量,
    ppri.UNIT AS 单位ID,
    ppri.UNITCODE AS 单位SAP内码,
    ppri.RECE_STATUS AS 物品收货状态,
    CASE 
        WHEN ppri.RECE_STATUS = 'projOrder_proRecStatus/01' THEN '未收货'
        WHEN ppri.RECE_STATUS = 'projOrder_proRecStatus/02' THEN '已收货'
        ELSE ppri.RECE_STATUS
    END AS 收货状态描述,
    ppri.SAP_RECE_STATUS AS SAP接收状态,
    CASE 
        WHEN ppri.SAP_RECE_STATUS = 'projOrder_proRecStatus/01' THEN '未收货'
        WHEN ppri.SAP_RECE_STATUS = 'projOrder_proRecStatus/02' THEN '已收货'
        ELSE ppri.SAP_RECE_STATUS
    END AS SAP接收状态描述,
    ppri.GOODS_DELI_RECE_STATUS AS 货物交接单接收状态,
    CASE 
        WHEN ppri.GOODS_DELI_RECE_STATUS = 'projOrder_proRecStatus/01' THEN '未收货'
        WHEN ppri.GOODS_DELI_RECE_STATUS = 'projOrder_proRecStatus/02' THEN '已收货'
        ELSE ppri.GOODS_DELI_RECE_STATUS
    END AS 交接单接收状态描述,
    ppri.SITE_DATE AS 实际货到现场日期,
    ppri.DELIVER_DATE AS 实际发货日期,
    ppri.PO_NO AS 采购订单编号,
    ppri.PO_ITEM_NO AS 采购订单行号,
    ppri.PRNO AS 采购申请号,
    ppri.PR_ITEM_NO AS 采购申请行号,
    ppri.CONTRACTNO AS 销售合同号,
    ppri.BATCH_NUMBER AS 批次号,
    ppri.LINE_NUMBER AS 供应商送货单行号,
    ppri.VBELP_IM AS 内向交货单行号,
    ppri.SAPSOI AS 销售订单行号,
    ppri.SAPSOH AS SAP销售订单头,
    ppri.HWDJH AS 货物交接单号,
    ppri.BPMSOID AS 销售订单行ID
FROM PROJORDER_PC_RECEIPT_INFOS ppri
LEFT JOIN PROJORDER_PC_RECEIPTS ppr ON ppri.MAIN_ID = ppr.ID
LEFT JOIN PROJORDER_GOODSDELIVERIES pgd ON ppri.GOODS_DELIVERY = pgd.ID
LEFT JOIN BASICDATA_PRODUCTS bp ON ppri.PRODUCT = bp.ID
WHERE ppr.CONTRACT IN (51952719418373, 128694894060421, 163995654764741);

Analysis.name: analysis_6
checks: 生效订单数量>生效发货数量
当对应物料生效订单数量-生效发货数量>0，且没有未生效的发货申请单
销售未提发货
Analysis.action:
1、仍需要发货：销售提交发货申请单；
2、不需要发货：提“3项目包含内容及付款调整”调减订单数量；
Analysis.notes:
特殊说明：
1、以上判断都基于物品属性中 是否仓库物品=是；如是否仓库物品=否、且物品采购属性=自制，有IT后台自动走账；
2、当WMS销售出库单已出库且单据关结，但是还是有未出库数量，可能存在WMS到SAP的接口、或SAP到BPM的接口问题；                                                                                                     特殊情况说明：
1、当首次物料行的发货方式由供应商直发改成了非直发、或者非直发改成了供应商直发，以上规则判断完后还有未出库的，需要判断更改后的出库流程是否未处理；
2、当以上未出库环节中存在对应的物料行有提红字发货申请单，需要排查是否红字、蓝字未冲抵；

注解：
1、直发改非直发：运管制定“发货物资缺料清单”参照对应的物料行改成直发，同时人工制定货物交接单，B页签参照物料行保存后，人工点击“直发同步SRM”，将货物交接单单号传到SRM的回货计划中；
2、非直发改成直发：运管制定“发货物资缺料清单”参照对应的物料行改成非直发，然后SAP-SDR001 - 销售发货处理平台 -创建销售出库单 中就会将对应的物料行展示出来，即可按照非直发的出库流程同步到WMS出库；

1. 生效发货数量是对应流程中的生效的发货申请数量？
——是的。发货单的单据流程已附

两种处理方式：人工判定？

checks: 生效订单数量=生效发货数量
生效发货数量>生效出库数量
当首次发货申请单对应对应物料行=供应商直发
SRM-回货计划是否有匹配的采购订单：当无匹配的采购订单
发货申请单对应的出厂运输方式≠冲抵借条、冲抵现场红字退库
Analysis.notes:
特殊说明：
1、以上判断都基于物品属性中 是否仓库物品=是；如是否仓库物品=否、且物品采购属性=自制，有IT后台自动走账；
2、当WMS销售出库单已出库且单据关结，但是还是有未出库数量，可能存在WMS到SAP的接口、或SAP到BPM的接口问题；                                                                                                     特殊情况说明：
1、当首次物料行的发货方式由供应商直发改成了非直发、或者非直发改成了供应商直发，以上规则判断完后还有未出库的，需要判断更改后的出库流程是否未处理；
2、当以上未出库环节中存在对应的物料行有提红字发货申请单，需要排查是否红字、蓝字未冲抵；

注解：
1、直发改非直发：运管制定“发货物资缺料清单”参照对应的物料行改成直发，同时人工制定货物交接单，B页签参照物料行保存后，人工点击“直发同步SRM”，将货物交接单单号传到SRM的回货计划中；
2、非直发改成直发：运管制定“发货物资缺料清单”参照对应的物料行改成非直发，然后SAP-SDR001 - 销售发货处理平台 -创建销售出库单 中就会将对应的物料行展示出来，即可按照非直发的出库流程同步到WMS出库；

能否基于采购进行细化到具体的处理方式，减少沟通判断？
